name: Delivery Time!
description:
Delivery Time is a puzzle game about using Carvana Power to deliver cars to people to make their lives happier!

For best experience, play the Windows Version.

Controls:
- Use the mouse to move the Hauler and the Carvana Power Tokens

Goal:
-  Deliver the Car to the Customer's House

Movement:
   1. The Hauler uses Carvana Power to Move Forward
   2. Carvana Power Tokens can move forward using another Carvana Power

Happiness:
   1. Grant 1 Happiness for Delivering The Car
   2. Grant 1 Happiness by Picking Up a Special Gift
   3. Grant 1 Happiness by Collecting Carvana Power
